description: Paul Bruce, 42, is charged after the town centre stabbing on Friday.
title: Paul Bruce charged after Swindon town centre stabbing
title_page: Paul Bruce charged after Swindon town centre stabbing - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged in connection with a stabbing which left another man with facial injuries.
Swindon Police said officers were called to Temple Street in the centre of Swindon on Friday afternoon.
Since the incident Paul Bruce, 42, of Bowman Street, has been charged with causing grievous bodily harm.
After appearing at Swindon Magistrates' Court today, he was remanded in custody to appear at the town's crown court on 4 April.
